resources.string: DGT board
Lichess & DGT
DGT Board Requirements
DGT Board Limitations
This page allows you to connect your DGT board to Lichess and use it for games.
To connect to the DGT Electronic Board, you will need to install %s.
You can download the software here: %s.

string.name: ifLiveChessRunningOnThisComputer
string.comment:
%1$s = LiveChess %2$s = opening this link
LiveChess is a proper noun and not translatable. Please remember to put punctuation after %2$s.

resources.string: If %1$s is running on this computer, you can check your connection to it by %2$s.
opening this link

string.name: ifLiveChessRunningElsewhere
string.comment:
%1$s = LiveChess %2$s = Configuration Section
Please remember to put punctuation after %2$s.

resources.string: If %1$s is running on a different machine or different port, you will need to set the IP address and port here in the %2$s.

string.name: configurationSection
string.comment:
Please note this is part of a longer sentence: If LiveChess is running on a different machine or different port, you will need to set the IP address and port here in the Configuration Section.
Links to DGT board configuration section.

resources.string: Configuration Section

The Configuration page needs to remain open in your browser. It does not need to be visible. You can minimize the page or set it to the side of the Lichess game page. Please do not close it, or the board will disconnect.
The board will auto connect to any game that is already on course or any new game that starts. Ability to choose which game to play is coming soon.
Time controls for casual games: Classical, Correspondence and Rapid only.
Time controls for rated games: Classical, Correspondence and some Rapids including 15+10 and 20+0
When ready, setup your board and then click %s.
If a move is not detected
Check that you have made your opponent\'s move on the DGT board first. Revert your move. Play again.
As a last resort, setup the board identically as Lichess, then %s
Reload this page
DGT - Configure
Lichess connectivity
You have an OAuth token suitable for DGT play.
A %s entry was added to your PLAY menu at the top.
No suitable OAuth token has been created.
DGT board connectivity

string.name: clickToGenerateOne
string.comment: clickToGenerateOne 'One' here referring to a token for authorisation.

resources.string: Click to generate one

string.name: webSocketUrl
string.comment:
%s is 'LiveChess <version number>'
For example, the full text could be something like 'LiveChess 1.2 Websocket URL'.
LiveChess is broadcasting technology by the DGT Company, used by many third parties.
LiveChess and WebSockets should both be treated as proper nouns in your translation.

resources.string: %s WebSocket URL

string.name: useWebSocketUrl
string.comment:
useWebSocketUrl
%1$s = ws://localhost:1982/api/v1.0 (this is a URL) %2$s = LiveChess
Complete string: Use "ws://localhost:1982/api/v1.0" unless LiveChess is running on a different machine or different port.
LiveChess is a move broadcasting technology by the DGT Company, used by many third parties.

resources.string: Use \"%1$s\" unless %2$s is running on a different machine or different port.
Text to speech
Configure voice narration of the played moves, so you can keep your eyes on the board.
Enable Speech Synthesis
Speech synthesis voice
Announce All Moves
Select YES to announce both your moves and your opponent\'s moves. Select NO to announce only your opponent\'s moves.
Announce Move Format
SAN is the standard on Lichess like \"Nf6\". UCI is common on engines like \"g8f6\".
Keywords
Keywords are in JSON format. They are used to translate moves and results into your language. Default is English, but feel free to change it.

string.name: debug
string.comment: This is a heading for tools to help with resolving issues in how the DGT e-board integration is working (debugging).

resources.string: Debug

string.name: verboseLogging
string.comment: Verbose in this context means to log errors and events in much more detail than standard. This is a function to help with resolving issues in how the software is working (debugging).

resources.string: Verbose logging
To see console message press Control + Shift + C (Linux, Windows, Chrome OS) or Command + Option + C (Mac)
Play with a DGT board

string.name: configure
string.comment: Heading for configuring a DGT board: https://lichess.org/dgt/config

resources.string: Configure
